snippet: The ballerina, who retired from American Ballet Theater in 2007, will return to the Metropolitan Opera House in the role of Juliet in Kenneth MacMillan’s “Romeo and Juliet.”
abstract: The ballerina, who retired from American Ballet Theater in 2007, will return to the Metropolitan Opera House in the role of Juliet in Kenneth MacMillan’s “Romeo and Juliet.”

headline.main: Alessandra Ferri to Return as Juliet for One Performance
headline.print_headline: Ferri in Brief Return to Ballet Theater
